create.description: Creates a new patch from scratch, just point the applications you want as package name.
examples: Create a patch for given package: patch-package create graphql

directory.name: directory
directory.description: Directory for outputting the patch files.

path.name: path
path.description: Directory to take root as the application.

list.description: Lists all the static entities that are shipped with this module.

patch.description: Patches or reserves given patches in a directory.
examples: Only apply certain patches with: patch-package apply graphql+15.5.0 class-validator+0.4.0
Use extended glob patterns: patch-package patch "graphql*"

directory.name: directory
directory.description: Directory to apply the patches from.

exitOnError.name: exitOnError
exitOnError.description: Whether to exit on error if the patching process fails or not.

reverse.name: reverse
reverse.description: Reverses the patches, if they were applied before.
